### hexlet-points

A SICP'ish Points implemented in Python using hexlet-pairs.

### Usage

<!-- This code will be doctested. Do not touch the markup! -->

    >>> from hexlet import points
    >>> p = points.make(100, 200)
    >>> print(points.to_string(p))
    (100, 200)
    >>> points.get_x(p)
    100
    >>> points.get_y(p)
    200
